page.title: 08Planes over Holbeach Marsh
page.content: The R.A.F Holbeach Weaponry Range has been used since 1928 for training British and Western Alliance Military Pilots .The weapons they use are strafe, firing, bombing and rocketry.The bombs and rockets have a small flash and smoke charge so that they can be plotted.There are eight targets at R.A.F Holbeach ,including three ships,for bombing.The targets are widely spaced in the safety zones.They have to rebuild the targets at weekends and evenings.R.A.F Holbeach is a small unit on the marsh.The aircraft can fly very low over our school because there are no towns or hospitals in the area .They must fly above 500ft.The aircraft that they use are A10s,Harriers and F1 11s which belong to the U.S.A.F.The aircraft that go over cause a lot of bother night and day.
